name: e-referrals-service-patient-care-api
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: mkdir -p build && node_modules/.bin/speccy resolve specification/e-referrals-service-patient-care-api.yaml -i | poetry run python scripts/yaml2json.py | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py > build/e-referrals-service-patient-care-api.json
scripts.publish-aws: mkdir -p build && node_modules/.bin/speccy resolve specification/e-referrals-service-patient-care-api.yaml -i | poetry run python scripts/yaml2json.py | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py | poetry run python scripts/api-gateway-integration.py > build/e-referrals-service-patient-care-api-aws.json

author: NHS Digital
